name: Citizen Witch
description:
Explore the city, meet monsters and try to help folks!
Click on the bottom right corner of the game to play in fullscreen

The game seems to have audio issues on Google Chrome, play it on Firefox!

Citizen Witch is our entry to the 2018 Life.Love. Game Design Challenge hosted by Jennifer Ann's Group.

Theme of the jam was Bystander.

Game by Lucas Vially
